summary: This bill, the EO 14218 Act of 2025, introduced in the House of Representatives, aims to codify Executive Order 14218. The Executive Order's stated goal is to end taxpayer subsidization of open borders. The bill cites Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, indicating the document is in the public domain and not subject to copyright. The bill was introduced by Mr. Burchett and referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
